metadata.title: LAXMI | Luxury Italian Furniture Consulting Made in Italy
metadata.description: Exclusive luxury Italian furniture consulting. LAXMI guides discerning connoisseurs in selecting Made in Italy pieces: artisanal quality, unique design, timeless elegance. Milan.
metadata.keywords: luxury furniture, Italian furniture, furniture consulting Milan, luxury interior design, Made in Italy, designer furniture, exclusive furniture, consulenza arredamento, luxury furniture Italy

metadata.ogDescription: Exclusive experience in selecting high-end Italian furniture. Professionalism, quality, authenticity.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To bring beauty, light, personality, and luxury into people's homes.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To ensure people feel supported and guided in furnishing their homes.

service1.title: Furniture Consulting
service1.description: Personalized guidance to select the perfect pieces for your space.

service2.title: Boutique Reselling

service3.title: Interior Styling
service3.description: Complete styling services to bring your vision to life.

gallery.description: A curated collection of interior spaces that embody the essence of Italian luxury and timeless elegance.

cta.title: Begin Your Journey
cta.description: Let us guide you in creating a space that reflects your unique taste and the timeless elegance of Italian craftsmanship.

footer.description: Luxury Furniture Consulting & Boutique Reseller. Crafted for connoisseurs. Made in Italy.
footer.quote: "Goddess of wealth, fortune, prosperity, beauty and light"
